column1: Smoque BBQ////I have gone to some of the best hair salons and have paid way to much to get my hair done
column2: What's worst is that my cut or color wasn't necessarily  what I was looking for. I decided to take a leap of faith and stop into the Hair Cuttery in Skokie on Skokie Blvd . I met Georgia who listened to what my frustrations with my hair was and delivered the cut and color I love! Oh did I mention  1/2 the price!!! She's great and know her stuff.
